results.name: EKG sequence started at 6 instead of 2.
link: Peter Kagey, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000

mathematica: f[s_List] := Block[{m = s[[-1]], k = 3}, While[MemberQ[s, k] || GCD[m, k] == 1, k++]; Append[s, k]]; Nest[f, {6, 2}, 71] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jan 21 2016, after _Robert G. Wilson v_ at A064413 *)
